# The `M68kII` Namespace Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This namespace holds all of the target specific flags that instruction info tracks. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This namespace holds all of the target specific flags that instruction info tracks.

<SectionDefinition>

## Enumerations

### enum  {#adb1ef011f9833415094dce191a23ad88}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="enum llvm::M68kII::TOF ">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/target">Target</a> Operand Flag enum.

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="adb1ef011f9833415094dce191a23ad88ae40504bd63df1c211500fcd35a29a601" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_NO_FLAG">

</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adb1ef011f9833415094dce191a23ad88a79ada893fa3a7cbe1b2d180bedcf2ba9" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_ABSOLUTE_ADDRESS">
On a symbol operand this indicates that the immediate is the absolute address of the symbol
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adb1ef011f9833415094dce191a23ad88a9b5b1d8ef02f8f95a63b78aa46bc9f15" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_PC_RELATIVE_ADDRESS">
On a symbol operand this indicates that the immediate is the pc-relative address of the symbol
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adb1ef011f9833415094dce191a23ad88a6da451e267e7fa37d09e4f116d7a0f56" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_GOT">
On a symbol operand this indicates that the immediate is the offset to the GOT entry for the symbol name from the base of the GOT
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adb1ef011f9833415094dce191a23ad88a14de646b08b938d4b58469a685923fd7" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_GOTOFF">
On a symbol operand this indicates that the immediate is the offset to the location of the symbol name from the base of the GOT
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adb1ef011f9833415094dce191a23ad88a7c9861e5ad1a38ababe5a78c1c0c95f6" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_GOTPCREL">
On a symbol operand this indicates that the immediate is offset to the GOT entry for the symbol name from the current code location
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adb1ef011f9833415094dce191a23ad88a57e0e9fc5c5f19541861ef8dd3161679" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_PLT">
On a symbol operand this indicates that the immediate is offset to the PLT entry of symbol name from the current code location
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adb1ef011f9833415094dce191a23ad88a7420be6c99ca50b5c9681bd7c751cbac" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_TLSGD">
On a symbol operand, this indicates that the immediate is the offset to the slot in GOT which stores the information for accessing the TLS variable
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adb1ef011f9833415094dce191a23ad88ac50fc42c1821b21c2a8330bc683ea2b7" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_TLSLD">
On a symbol operand, this indicates that the immediate is the offset to variable within the thread local storage when operating in Local Dynamic mode
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adb1ef011f9833415094dce191a23ad88a403784327265ec4dd7136f05d6a3c79a" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_TLSLDM">
On a symbol operand, this indicates that the immediate is the offset to the slot in GOT which stores the information for accessing the TLS variable
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adb1ef011f9833415094dce191a23ad88ac20c347227f3c3c16af195d97d1c399b" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_TLSIE">
On a symbol operand, this indicates that the immediate is the offset to the variable within the thread local storage when operating in Initial Exec mode
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adb1ef011f9833415094dce191a23ad88a5f23a5d94574e27c889a585834ba0864" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_TLSLE">
On a symbol operand, this indicates that the immediate is the offset to the variable within in the thread local storage when operating in Local Exec mode
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

### isGlobalRelativeToPICBase() {#a58b5687ac518a430130855b87a819778}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="static bool llvm::M68kII::isGlobalRelativeToPICBase (unsigned char TargetFlag)"
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Return true if the specified global value reference is relative to a 32-bit PIC base (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68kisd/#a5d785b7c28047e4e75d1fed254de7a5eaf4ce8c5d66fc94f7573b82c3ace0491b">M68kISD::GLOBAL&#95;BASE&#95;REG</a>).

If this is true, the addressing mode has the PIC base register added in.
